markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Trailblazer](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=205)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 6</row>

</column>

Uncharted realms have always intrigued you, and you've explored and mapped large territories in service to merchants, governments, or your own curiosity. Where some see a blank spot on a map, you see the potential for something new and undiscovered.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) skill, and the [Cartography Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Terrain Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=851) skill feat with one terrain you've explored (such as forest or underground).
name: Trailblazer

summary_markdown: Uncharted realms have always intrigued you, and you've explored and mapped large territories in service to merchants, governments, or your own …
text: Trailblazer Source PFS Guide pg. 6 Uncharted realms have always intrigued you, and you've explored and mapped large territories in service to merchants, governments, or your own curiosity. Where some see a blank spot on a map, you see the potential for something new and undiscovered. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Survival skill, and the Cartography Lore skill. You gain the Terrain Expertise skill feat with one terrain you've explored (such as forest or underground).
